alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:16PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Laramie County through 645 PM MDT... At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burns, or 27 miles east of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, Burns, Albin and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 382 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
